title: Sun Transit in the 8th House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When the Sun transits the 8th house for Sagittarius Ascendant, focus turns toward transformation, shared resources, and hidden dynamics. This phase brings awareness to power structures, inheritances, debts, and deep emotional bonds. Ego may feel challenged through sudden changes, pushing inner strength and resilience. Interest in research, healing, or psychological depth increases. When approached with humility and adaptability, this transit supports inner regeneration, clarity around shared finances, and growth through facing uncertainty rather than resisting it.

sections.title: Finance
points: Focus on joint assets and debts

closing: This Sun transit tests ego through transformation. With humility, it becomes a period of deep strength, renewal, and empowered inner growth.
